title: 3 Best Helium 10 Modules for KDP Keyword Research
description:
Watch Next - Helium 10 vs Publisher Rocket vs Book Bolt: https://youtu.be/xlVBFATmuJ0

Helium 10 (50% off and 10% off Deals): https://bit.ly/334S3A3

Getting traffic to your no content and low content books onAmazon is essential for making sales. Low traffic means that not many customers are seeing your book. One way to improve traffic is by getting your book ranked highly in the Amazon searches by using keywords that have high search volume and low competition. There are a number of tools that can help and one of these is Helium 10 which can be used in a number of ways. In this video I show you the 3 ways I use Helium 10 to do keywrod research, reverse asin lookup and keyword track to increase book sales.

Tools and Resources I use:

Canva: https://bit.ly/paulcanva
Gumroad Shop for Keywords and Interiors: https://paulmarles.gumroad.com
Creative Fabrica: http://bit.ly/3XLaKoc
Publisher Rocket: http://bit.ly/2ThC390
Book Bolt (Use paul20 to get 20% OFF): https://bit.ly/3jY7K2L
